attributes.action: NO. REJECT the plan to house 300+ ‘refugees’ in Cameron Barracks, Inverness.
attributes.additional_details: The people have genuine concerns around housing over 300 undocumented men in one place, right in the centre of the Scottish Highlands’ largest city. This would be within a stone’s throw of a number of schools, Millburn and Raigmore to name 2, with reasonable concerns around grooming gangs and violence towards women. Cameron Barracks is right on the doorstep of a housing estate which is home to many children and families from the MOD, this is a real issue, real concern based on evidence.
attributes.background: Valid concerns about 300+ undocumented men being placed in the centre of the Scottish Highlands’ only city, right within a community housing families and MOD personnel. The problems that can occur from this  are well documented.
